channel.title: X-Scape 474
channel.description:
Hello fellow moparscapians, this is a project like no other. Why you ask? Well for 1, we will be converting every int that affects what happens in the server, into a long. (decided not to make into double for scienteific notation is not good for stats and stuff. We will be doing this right, not just sloppily throwing this together. There is no need to put pictures, because right now it's a blank 474. Note: not for the inexperienced coders, if you have not done have for a couple years, and really know the concepts, then you may join.
Server Development Posistions: Graphics, Server/Client coder, Website developer, Tester, and Idea guy. Note: one requirement is hamachi.
Graphics forum: Why do you want to be a part of this? How many years of experience? Example? Proof? Etc Hours of service available? Other stuff.
Server/Client coder: Why do you really want to do this? How many years of experience? What knowledge do you know on java? (eg. Ints, arrays, threads, reflections, etc) Hours of service available? Other:
Website developer: What languages do you know? (c#, JavaScript, HTML, etc) Why do you want to be part of this? Proof of actual website designs? (not freeform either) Hours of service available? Other?
For idea and testers, pm me with stuff u think of,. For there is noform. You WILL get credits when it comes out.
Thank you for reading through this!
Edit: we may decide to just screw a source, and start writing our own. However, we will need more brains then just me for this, read my posh (6th post) for what it might include.

Accepted, but only thing is, we will be getting a blank domain, so we will be doing this from scratch.

item.title: X-Scape 474
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh13 pkerjosh13
item.description:
@pkerjosh13 wrote:

Website developer:
What languages do you know? Hypertext Markup Language (HTML) PHP: Hypertext Preprocessor (PHP) Active Server Pages (ASP) Java Server Pages (JSP) many more
Why do you want to be part of this? because i been looking for a project to contribute my skills to and i belive my 5 years expirence will be a big contributer too
Proof of actual website designs? add my msn and i will show you what template you can recive or check out (http://www.clantemplates.com/templates/default_ferociousgaming/) id also like to add that im a sponser for clantemplates.com
Hours of service available? 6 days a week 7 hours a day
Other?id also like to add that im a sponser for clantemplates.com

Read full topic

item.title: X-Scape 474
item.dc:creator: @XxPkRaperxX XxPkRaperxX
item.description:
@XxPkRaperxX wrote:

Server/Client coder: More of a server coder, but I know some client stuff to.
Why do you really want to do this? I’m looking for a project to work on and I loved the 474 era.
How many years of experience? Less than a year.
What knowledge do you know on java? (eg. Ints, arrays, threads, reflections, etc) The basics, threading, array sorting, etc.
Hours of service available? It really depends but I can at least 35 hours a week.
Other: If your serious about this, I think it would be more formal to talk on MSN. Just PM me or post telling me to PM you and I can give you my MSN. I think I can be a valuable asset in your journey of creating this server.

Read full topic

item.title: X-Scape 474
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Thanks man, and I wrote this whole thing on my iPod, so when I get on computer I will be sure to clean this up. Also of I get a good team, I’m thinking of making my own base and everything. Except unlike winterlove and stuff. It sill be codes the way it should be, right. It will also be very customizable, but that is to much for just me to do.

Read full topic
